# CS50 Library for Python

Supports Python 2 and Python 3.

## Installation

Using `pip`:

```
pip install cs50
```

See https://github.com/cs50/python-cs50 for more!

## Usage

    import cs50

    ...

    c = cs50.get_char();
    f = cs50.get_float();
    i = cs50.get_int();
    l = cs50.get_long(); # Python 2 only
    s = cs50.get_string();
